description: This file defines the LobbyController class, which provides REST API endpoints for managing game room lifecycle operations such as creating, listing, joining, leaving, toggling readiness, and starting a game within a lobby. It uses Spring MVC annotations and interacts with the RoomService.

classes.name: LobbyController
classes.description: REST controller providing endpoints for room lifecycle management such as creating, joining, leaving, toggling readiness, and starting games within a lobby.

methods.name: create
methods.description: Creates a new game room with the provided name and returns the room details.

methods.name: list
methods.description: Returns a list of all available game rooms.

methods.name: join
methods.description: Allows a user to join a specific room by code, returning the associated PlayerDTO.

methods.name: leave
methods.description: Removes a player from a room, using color information for identification.

methods.name: ready
methods.description: Toggles the ready state of a player within a room.

methods.name: start
methods.description: Initiates the start of the game in a specified room.
